verses.verse: <S%H6258>Now<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> drew <S%H7126>near<s%> that he should <S%H4191>die;<s%> and he <S%H6680>charged<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
I <S%H1980>go<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> be you <S%H2388>strong<s%> therefore, and show yourself a <S%H376>man;<s%>

And <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and his <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> and his <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and his <S%H5715>testimonies,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> that you may <S%H7919>prosper<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> that you <S%H6213>do,<s%> and <S%H3605>wherever<s%> you <S%H6437>turn<s%> yourself:

That the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> may <S%H6965>continue<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> me, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%> take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to their <S%H1870>way,<s%> to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me in <S%H571>truth<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H5315>soul,<s%> there shall not <S%H3772>fail<s%> you <S%H559>(said<s%> he) a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H1571>Moreover<s%> you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to me, and <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H6635>hosts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> and to <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3500>Jether,<s%> whom he <S%H2026>slew,<s%> and <S%H7760>shed<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> in <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> on his <S%H2290>girdle<s%> that was about his <S%H4975>loins,<s%> and in his <S%H5275>shoes<s%> that were on his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
<S%H6213>Do<s%> therefore according to your <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and let not his <S%H7872>hoar<s%> head <S%H3381>go<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

But <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite,<s%> and let them be of those that <S%H398>eat<s%> at your <S%H7979>table:<s%> for <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to me when I <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of <S%H53>Absalom<s%> your <S%H251>brother.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you have with you <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1617>Gera,<s%> a <S%H1145>Benjamite<s%> of <S%H980>Bahurim,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> <S%H7043>cursed<s%> me with a <S%H4834>grievous<s%> <S%H7045>curse<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H4266>Mahanaim:<s%> but he <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> me at <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and I <S%H7650>swore<s%> to him by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I will not put you to <S%H4191>death<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore hold him not <S%H5352>guiltless:<s%> for you are a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> and <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H853>what<s%> <S%H834><s%> you ought to <S%H6213>do<s%> to him; but his <S%H7872>hoar<s%> head <S%H3381>bring<s%> you <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave<s%> with <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> with his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%>

And the <S%H3117>days<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years:<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> he in <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> he in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
Then <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> on the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H1>father;<s%> and his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> was <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

And <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> the <S%H517>mother<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%> And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H935>Come<s%> you <S%H7965>peaceably?<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7965>Peaceably.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> moreover, I have somewhat to <S%H1697>say<s%> to you. And she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1696>Say<s%> on.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> You <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> was mine, and that <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H6440>faces<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> me, that I should <S%H4427>reign:<s%> however, the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> is <S%H5437>turned<s%> <S%H5437>about,<s%> and is <S%H1961>become<s%> my <S%H251>brother's:<s%> for it was his from the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And <S%H6258>now<s%> I <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7596>petition<s%> of you, <S%H7725>deny<s%> me not. And she <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1696>Say<s%> on.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H559>Speak,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> (for he will not <S%H7725>say<s%> you no,) that he <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>
And <S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2896>Well;<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> for you to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

<S%H1339>Bathsheba<s%> therefore <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon,<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him for <S%H138>Adonijah.<s%> And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6965>rose<s%> up to <S%H7125>meet<s%> her, and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself to her, and <S%H3427>sat<s%> down <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and caused a <S%H3678>seat<s%> to be <S%H7760>set<s%> for the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H517>mother;<s%> and she <S%H3427>sat<s%> on his <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand.<s%>

Then she <S%H559>said,<s%> I <S%H7592>desire<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6996>small<s%> <S%H7596>petition<s%> of you; I pray you, <S%H7725>say<s%> me not <S%H6440>no.<s%> And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H7592>Ask<s%> on, my <S%H517>mother:<s%> for I will not <S%H7725>say<s%> you no.
And she <S%H559>said,<s%> Let <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> be <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> to <S%H802>wife.<s%>

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H517>mother,<s%> And <S%H4100>why<s%> do you <S%H7592>ask<s%> <S%H49>Abishag<s%> the <S%H7767>Shunammite<s%> for <S%H138>Adonijah?<s%> <S%H7592>ask<s%> for him the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> also; for he is my <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H251>brother;<s%> even for him, and for <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and for <S%H3097>Joab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah.<s%>

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> to me, and <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H3541>also,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> against his own <S%H5315>life.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> has <S%H3559>established<s%> me, and <S%H3427>set<s%> me <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H834>who<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> me an <S%H1004>house,<s%> as he <S%H1696>promised,<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada;<s%> and he <S%H6293>fell<s%> on him that he <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And to <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3212>Get<s%> you to <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> to your own <S%H7704>fields;<s%> for you are <S%H376>worthy<s%> of <S%H4194>death:<s%> but I will not at <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>time<s%> put you to <S%H4191>death,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> you <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H136>LORD<s%> <S%H3069>God<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H3588>because<s%> you have been <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> was <S%H6031>afflicted.<s%>

So <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H1644>thrust<s%> out <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> from <S%H1961>being<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> that he might <S%H4390>fulfill<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5941>Eli<s%> in <S%H7887>Shiloh.<s%>

Then <S%H8052>tidings<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab:<s%> for <S%H3097>Joab<s%> had <S%H5186>turned<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah,<s%> though he <S%H5186>turned<s%> not <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H53>Absalom.<s%> And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H2388>caught<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> that <S%H3097>Joab<s%> was <S%H5127>fled<s%> to the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he is by the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> Then <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H6293>fall<s%> on him.

And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> <S%H3318>Come<s%> <S%H3318>forth.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No;<s%> but I will <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6311>here.<s%> And <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> <S%H7725>brought<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and <S%H3541>thus<s%> he <S%H6030>answered<s%> me.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H6213>Do<s%> as he has <S%H1696>said,<s%> and <S%H6293>fall<s%> on him, and <S%H6912>bury<s%> him; that you may <S%H5493>take<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> the <S%H2600>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H8210>shed,<s%> from me, and from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H1>father.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> on his own <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6293>fell<s%> on <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> more <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and <S%H2896>better<s%> than he, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> them with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> not <S%H3045>knowing<s%> thereof, to wit, <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3500>Jether,<s%> <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

Their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall therefore <S%H7725>return<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%> but on <S%H1732>David,<s%> and on his <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and on his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and on his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> shall there be <S%H7965>peace<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

So <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up, and <S%H6293>fell<s%> on him, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him: and he was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3111>Jehoiada<s%> in his <S%H8478>room<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6635>host:<s%> and <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> did the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> in the <S%H8478>room<s%> of <S%H54>Abiathar.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H1129>Build<s%> you an <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H3318>go<s%> not <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> any <S%H575>where.<s%>

For it shall be, that on the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H3318>go<s%> out, and <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H6939>Kidron,<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> for <S%H3045>certain<s%> that you shall surely <S%H4191>die:<s%> your <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on your own <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> The <S%H1697>saying<s%> is <S%H2896>good:<s%> as my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H1696>said,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> will your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6213>do.<s%> And <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> that <S%H8147>two<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H1272>ran<s%> away to <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maachah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath.<s%> And they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> be in <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>

And <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath<s%> to <S%H397>Achish<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H5650>servants:<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> from <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> that <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> had <S%H1980>gone<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H1661>Gath,<s%> and was <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Did I not make you to <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5749>protested<s%> to you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3045>Know<s%> for a certain, on the <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H3318>go<s%> out, and <S%H1980>walk<s%> abroad any <S%H575>where,<s%> that you shall surely <S%H4191>die?<s%> and you <S%H559>said<s%> to me, The <S%H1697>word<s%> that I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> is <S%H2896>good.<s%>
<S%H4100>Why<s%> then have you not <S%H8104>kept<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> that I have <S%H6680>charged<s%> you with?

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> moreover to <S%H8096>Shimei,<s%> You <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%> is <S%H3045>privy<s%> to, that you <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H1>father:<s%> therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> on your own <S%H7218>head;<s%>

And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> shall be <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> and the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> for ever.
